label: clinical_signal_03_dx_vaccine_immunogenicity_017
content:
## 2024-06-24 Daily Operations Summary

### Enrollment
- Total Enrolled: 126
- Active: 119
- Screen Failures Cumulative: 25
- Withdrawals Cumulative: 7

### Enrollment by Dose Group
- Low Dose: 31
- Mid Dose: 30
- High Dose: 33
- Placebo: 32

### Immunogenicity By Group
- Low Dose
  - IgG Titer (GMU) Mean: 71.4
  - IgG Titer (GMU) SD: 6.0
  - IgM Titer (GMU) Mean: 20.6
  - IgM Titer (GMU) SD: 4.0
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 Mean: 105.5
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 SD: 10.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC per 10^6) Mean: 169.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC per 10^6) SD: 15.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC per 10^6) Mean: 122.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC per 10^6) SD: 11.0
  - Seroconversion Percentage: 32.9
- Mid Dose
  - IgG Titer (GMU) Mean: 108.4
  - IgG Titer (GMU) SD: 9.6
  - IgM Titer (GMU) Mean: 29.3
  - IgM Titer (GMU) SD: 6.4
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 Mean: 186.2
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 SD: 16.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC per 10^6) Mean: 270.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC per 10^6) SD: 24.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC per 10^6) Mean: 192.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC per 10^6) SD: 18.0
  - Seroconversion Percentage: 44.0
- High Dose
  - IgG Titer (GMU) Mean: 150.2
  - IgG Titer (GMU) SD: 13.2
  - IgM Titer (GMU) Mean: 39.5
  - IgM Titer (GMU) SD: 8.8
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 Mean: 245.1
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 SD: 22.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC per 10^6) Mean: 379.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC per 10^6) SD: 33.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC per 10^6) Mean: 254.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC per 10^6) SD: 24.0
  - Seroconversion Percentage: 58.8
- Placebo
  - IgG Titer (GMU) Mean: 16.1
  - IgG Titer (GMU) SD: 1.2
  - IgM Titer (GMU) Mean: 6.2
  - IgM Titer (GMU) SD: 0.8
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 Mean: 18.0
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 SD: 2.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC per 10^6) Mean: 35.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC per 10^6) SD: 3.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC per 10^6) Mean: 29.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC per 10^6) SD: 2.0
  - Seroconversion Percentage: 6.5

### Injection Site Reactions
- Pain Percentage: 37.5
- Erythema Percentage: 19.9
- Swelling Percentage: 18.6
- Induration Percentage: 7.5
- Mean Pain Duration (hours): 33.5

### Systemic Reactogenicity
- Fever Percentage: 17.4
- Fatigue Percentage: 33.5
- Myalgia Percentage: 27.9
- Headache Percentage: 25.0
- Chills Percentage: 8.7

### Safety Labs
- WBC (K) Mean: 7.0
- WBC (K) SD: 1.5
- Lymphocyte Percentage Mean: 30.1
- Lymphocyte Percentage SD: 7.7
- Neutrophil Percentage Mean: 49.5
- Neutrophil Percentage SD: 7.7
- Platelets (K) Mean: 241
- Platelets (K) SD: 40
- CRP (mg/L) Mean: 5.1
- CRP (mg/L) SD: 1.6
- Hemoglobin (g/dL) Mean: 13.7
- Hemoglobin (g/dL) SD: 0.9

### Adverse Events
- AE ID: VI-AE-1745, Description: lymphadenopathy, Grade: 2, Relatedness: possibly related, Resolved: true, Dose Group: high_dose
- AE ID: VI-AE-1743, Description: fatigue, Grade: 2, Relatedness: possibly related, Resolved: true, Dose Group: high_dose
- AE ID: VI-AE-1715, Description: chills, Grade: 1, Relatedness: related, Resolved: true, Dose Group: low_dose
- AE ID: VI-AE-1782, Description: malaise, Grade: 1, Relatedness: possibly related, Resolved: true, Dose Group: low_dose

### Events
- Vaccine lot VX-857 temperature excursion assessed: within acceptable range
- Vaccine lot VX-943 temperature excursion assessed: within acceptable range

### Notes
- Week 17: Immunogenicity assessments on schedule. 126 subjects enrolled across dose groups. Reactogenicity profiles consistent with prior weeks.
